mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, notice, userId, subject, content) VALUES (#{num}, #{notice}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content})
INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId = m.userId

SELECT n.num, n.userId, userName, notice, subject, content, hitCount,TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m1 ON n.userId=m1.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY num )f ON n.num = f.num WHERE NOTICE = 1 ORDER BY num DESC
